inclusion.criterion: Estimated glomerular filtration rate below 20 ml/min
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: A clinical judgement made by the contact nurse and the contact physician
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: A set date for a transplantation with a living donor
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Not able to participate due to cognitive impairment
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has atypical hemolytic uremic syndrome and was treated with plasma exchange and corticosteroids.
